scripts.build: npm -w @zkpip/core run build && npm -w @zkpip/cli run build
scripts.lint:types: npm run lint:types:core && npm run lint:types:adp:groth16 && npm run lint:types:adp:plonk && npm run lint:types:adp:stark && npm run lint:types:batchseal && npm run lint:types:cli
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix packages/core run build && npm --prefix packages/adapters/groth16 run build && npm --prefix packages/adapters/plonk run build && npm --prefix packages/adapters/stark run build && npm --prefix packages/batchseal run build && npm --prefix packages/cli run build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:core && npm run test:batchseal && npm run test:adp:groth16 && npm run test:adp:plonk && npm run test:adp:stark && npm --prefix packages/cli test
scripts.ci:local: npm ci || npm install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/core install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/adapters/groth16 install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/adapters/plonk install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/adapters/stark install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/batchseal install --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix packages/cli install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build:all && npm run test:all
